features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with login, signup, and role-based access control. Supports multiple user roles: student, faculty, college admin, recruiter, and super admin.

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features showcase, and role-based information.

features.name: Student Dashboard
features.description: Student dashboard with assessments, skills tracking, certificates, daily quizzes, history, and recommendations.

features.name: Faculty Dashboard
features.description: Faculty dashboard for managing assessments, questions, students, and viewing analytics.

features.name: Assessment Management
features.description: Full CRUD operations for assessments including creation, editing, deletion, and listing. Supports MCQ, coding, practical, and mixed assessment types.

features.name: AI Question Generation
features.description: AI-powered question generation using OpenAI API for creating assessment questions automatically.

features.name: College Admin Dashboard
features.description: College administration dashboard for managing faculty, students, and college settings.

features.name: Recruiter Dashboard
features.description: Recruiter portal for searching students, verifying certificates, and shortlisting candidates.

features.name: Super Admin Dashboard
features.description: Super admin dashboard for platform-wide management including users, colleges, certificates, skills, templates, reports, and analytics.

features.name: Certificate System
features.description: Certificate generation, verification, and management with QR code support.

features.name: Question Management
features.description: Question bank management for creating and managing assessment questions.

features.name: Skill Gap Analysis
features.description: Analyzes student skill gaps and provides recommendations based on assessment performance.

features.name: Resume Generation
features.description: PDF resume generation for students with verified skills and certificates.

features.name: Template Management
features.description: Assessment template management for creating reusable assessment structures.

features.name: Dashboard Shell
features.description: Reusable dashboard layout component with navigation and sidebar.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Comprehensive UI component library using Shadcn/UI with Radix UI primitives.

features.name: Theme Provider
features.description: Dark/light theme support with next-themes integration.

features.name: Firebase Admin
features.description: Firebase Admin SDK integration for server-side operations.

features.name: Data Seeding
features.description: Scripts for seeding dummy data and creating initial users.
